name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David Patrick KELLY, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David Patrick KELLY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Court being evenly divided, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Raymond P. Amatangelo, Amatangelo & Baisley, Janette Baisley, Donora, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 159
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David Patrick KELLY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
Reargument Denied Feb. 14, 1990.
Raymond P. Amatangelo, Amatangelo & Baisley, Janette Baisley, Donora, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
